animated_text: From Software Development to Ensuring Quality Through Testing
developer_description: With a background in full-stack development, I now focus on ensuring quality across the entire product lifecycle. I use both manual and automated testing to validate complex systems, uncover edge cases and support fast, predictable releases. My goal is simple: help teams ship stable, reliable and user-focused applications.
page_description: Discover the projects, portfolio, and professional background of Marek Święchowicz.
about_me_content: Learn more about Marek Święchowicz, a Quality Assurance Engineer. Discover my journey, projects, and what drives my passion for programming.
biography_paragraph_1: I began my tech journey at Geeknauts, building a strong foundation in web and mobile development. Working across both individual and team projects, I focused on creating intuitive user experiences and reliable application features, gaining versatility and a solid engineering mindset.
biography_paragraph_2: As my career evolved through Thundersoft and 3mk, I transitioned into quality engineering, taking ownership of testing across complex systems. This path eventually led me to SiriusXM, where I now focus on automation, integration validation and system-level reliability for large-scale, real-world applications used across the automotive ecosystem.
workDescriptionGeeknauts: I worked on web and mobile application development, contributing to both team-based and independent projects. I delivered frontend and backend features, improved performance and usability, and supported release workflows. This role built the engineering foundation that later enabled my transition into quality engineering and automation.
workDescriptionThunderSoft: As a Test Engineer at ThunderSoft, I worked on infotainment and connected-car systems, performing functional and integration testing in embedded environments. My responsibilities included analyzing logs, validating backend communication flows, and supporting release readiness. I collaborated closely with developers to improve overall system stability.
workDescription3MK: At 3MK, I was responsible for end-to-end quality across web, backend and mobile applications. I created and executed test plans, performed exploratory and regression testing, and supported early automation using Playwright and TypeScript. Working as the sole QA, I ensured high coverage, clear reporting, and direct communication with developers and product stakeholders.
workDescriptionSiriusXM: As a Quality Engineer at SiriusXM, I work on the validation of in-vehicle applications used across a large automotive ecosystem. I focus on system reliability, automation, and integration testing to ensure high-quality releases in real-world conditions. My responsibilities include designing and executing test strategies, investigating system-level issues, and collaborating with engineering teams across Ireland and the US.
bachelor: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
bachelorInfo: Relevant courses included Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Systems Engineering, and Artificial Intelligence
masters: Master of Science in Computer Science, Specialization in Cybersecurity
mastersInfo: The Master's coursework included hands-on experience with security assessment and penetration testing tools such as Nmap, SonarQube, and Burp Suite, emphasizing practical approaches to vulnerability analysis and network security.
CKEditor_title: REST API and CKEditor 5 Real-Time Collaboration Showcase
CKEditor_summary: This project demonstrates my expertise in configuring and testing REST APIs, with a focus on real-time collaboration features. It includes several projects and tasks, each addressing specific aspects of API integration and testing.
T-mobile_summary: This project demonstrates automated testing of the T-Mobile website's product purchase flow using Selenium WebDriver with Java and Cucumber.
portfolio_summary: This portfolio website was created using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.
